name: Fight or Flight (itch) (3079, blobasaur, chertkov)
description:
Fight or Flight is a strategy tower-defence game where you have to defend your base by building protective towers and assigning your workers to operate them.

Place towers, mines and rockets using buttons on the right, left click the buildings to select and operate them, when building is selected you can use menu buttons or hot keys:

Left click - Select building

E -  Assign worker

Q - Free worker

F - Upgrade

X - Sell building

Space to launch rocket when it's selected

Right click - remove selection, cancel placing of the building

Once again, you have to assign workers to buildings in order for them to attack / start gaining gold. 

Once the population of your base turns 0 (from either enemy damage or evacuating all the people) the game is over

The goal of the game is to evacuate as many people as possible by buying and sending rockets.
